entities.name: people
entities.description: Refers to individuals with cheaper tickets who have to arrive two weeks beforehand.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Refers to non-magical people who are not aware of the wizarding world.

entities.name: wizards
entities.description: Refers to individuals with magical abilities.

entities.name: portkeys
entities.description: Objects used to transport wizards from one spot to another at a prearranged time.

entities.name: stoatshead hill
entities.description: A location where a Portkey is placed.

entities.name: ottery st. catchpole
entities.description: A village where the group is currently located.

relationships.description: Portkeys are placed at strategic points around Britain, and one of them is located at Stoatshead Hill.
People with cheaper tickets have to arrive two weeks beforehand to avoid clogging up Muggle transport.
